description.en:
A cute collection of short stories, packed full of love!

[*][b] Hizamazuite Ai wo Chikae (Swear Love On Your Knees)[/b]
Arisa is in love with Naoe, her bodyguard, but he'll never see her as anything more than a job!

[*][b] Omae no Karada ni Kiitemiro (Try Asking Your Body)[/b]
"How does everyone choose only one person among so many people in this world?" That is the question that Yuasa Jun wants to find the answer for, and he just might find the answer with the help of Igarashi Misao. The girl who just beat him up for hurting her friend!

[*][b] Yokubou Star[/b]
A famous high school novelist and his assistant... what shape will this love-story take?

[*][b] Koibito. Zenyasai (Lover. The Eye)[/b]
"Culture festival is coming soon... For the costume parade, out class has decided on the theme 'Cinderella'. I, Mamiya Ena, am the Cinderella!" Yet, Ena's boyfriend, Mikio, refuses to play the role of the prince...

[*][b] Tennen Ecstasy (Natural Ecstasy)[/b]
She's finally released from hospital and can go to school but ends up seeing her player classmate doing...
